channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Experts warn Chinese "Ink Dragon" hackers extend reach into European governments
item.description: Several dozen entities were recently targeted with an updated backdoor.

item.title: AI blindness is costing your business: how to build trust in the data powering AI
item.description: AI can only deliver real value when organizations build trustworthy, complete and real-time data foundations.

item.title: Mozilla’s new CEO says AI is coming to Firefox, but will remain a choice
item.description: Mozilla has appointed Anthony Enzor-DeMeo as its CEO, as the Firefox developer scrambles to adapt in a rapidly changing browser market.

item.title: Google’s vibe-coding tool Opal comes to Gemini
item.description: The company on Wednesday said it is integrating the tool, which lets you build AI-powered mini apps, inside the Gemini web app, allowing users to create their own custom apps.

item.title: Holidays 2025: retailers face a perfect storm of traffic, threats, and customer pressure
item.description: For retailers, the holiday season continues to be the biggest, most unforgiving moment in the calendar.

item.title: Say goodbye to muscle soreness with the five-star Theragun Pro Plus — on sale for a record-low price
item.description: The five-star Theragun Pro Plus is discounted to a record-low price of $529.99 just in time for Christmas.

item.title: Warner Bros. rejects Paramount deal, but the Netflix merger drama is only just beginning
item.description: Warner Bros. tells shareholders to reject Paramount deal, but Netflix hasn't won the merger fight yet.

item.title: Google Chrome : une simple page web permet de pirater votre PC, installez la mise à jour
item.description: Google colmate en urgence deux nouvelles failles critiques dans Chrome. Elles peuvent permettre d’exécuter du code à distance simplement en piégeant une page web. Google déploie en ce moment une mise à jour de sécurité pour protéger les usagers.

item.title: Steam Machine : cette fuite dévoile l’animation de démarrage, avec un clin d’oeil à un jeu culte de Valve
item.description: Un leaker a pu extraire l'animation de démarrage qui s'affichera au lancement de la Steam Machine.

item.title: We asked our staff for their 2026 predictions
item.description: In all the chaos of 2025, The Verge was able to see through the fog and focus on the consumer technology that really made an impact this year: robot vacuums, thin foldable phones, experimental laptops, handheld gaming consoles, and of course, generative AI. You can watch our standout picks in our video here. All this […]

item.title: Let’s talk about Fallout season 2
item.description: Years often go by between new seasons of big streaming shows - just ask fans of Severance or Stranger Things - but with Fallout the wait hasn't been so bad. The first season was a welcome surprise when it started streaming last April, managing to capture the series' distinctly playful take on the end of […]

item.title: Netflix’s next big TV game is FIFA soccer
item.description: The World Cup is happening next year, and Netflix and FIFA are working on a new soccer simulation game in celebration of the tournament. "This summer, when the world gathers to celebrate the FIFA World Cup 2026, fans can play a newly reimagined FIFA football simulation game exclusively on Netflix Games," Netflix says. The new […]

item.title: OnePlus 15R review: unbeatable battery life, beatable value
item.description: The OnePlus 15R's battery life is exceptional. It's a smidge better than the very impressive OnePlus 15's, and the 15R costs two hundred dollars less. So why am I having a hard time recommending it? Typically, OnePlus' R-series phone is a simplified, less-expensive follow-up to the main flagship - in this case, the OnePlus 15. […]

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Thursday, December 18 (game #1424)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Thursday, December 18 (game #921)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Thursday, December 18 (game #655)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: I tested the Sachtler Ace M MS Mk II video tripod, and it's the best set of legs for the modern content creator
item.description: The Sachtler Ace M MS Mk II video tripod offers modern content creators the perfect blend of portability and stability

item.title: The OnePlus 15R has landed with an even bigger battery than the OnePlus 15
item.description: The OnePlus 15R, OnePlus Pad Go 2, and OnePlus Watch Lite are now available to pre-order.

item.title: OnePlus 15R review: A 165Hz display and big battery for $700
item.description:
I know what you're thinking, didn't OnePlus release a new phone just last month? It did. A little over five weeks after the announcement of the OP15, the company is back with the OnePlus 15R, a more affordable version of its new flagship that starts at $700 (or $200 less than its sibling). Off the top, this will be a shorter review because most of what I said about the OnePlus 15 also applies to the OP15R. It's a great phone that asks you to make one pretty significant compromise.
Design and display
The OnePlus 15R's screen is slightly cooler than that of the OnePlus 15.
Igor Bon...

item.title: Boîte de réception | Marketplace, Facebook et faux courriels publicitaires
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, vendre sur Marketplace, récupérer son compte Facebook et éliminer les courriels publicitaires.

item.title: OnePlus dévoile une montre ultra fine à la fonction inédite, le tout sous la barre des 180 euros
item.description: OnePlus a dévoilé sa nouvelle montre connectée d'entrée de gamme, la OnePlus Watch Lite, qui se distingue par son design fin et élégant et sa connexion simultanée à deux smartphones.

item.title: Test du OnePlus 15R : il pulvérise tous les records d’autonomie pour un prix en chute
item.description: Outre un environnement logiciel séduisant, le petit frère du OnePlus 15 dispose d'un équipement performant, à l'image de son processeur Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5, de son écran OLED 165 Hz, mais aussi - et surtout - de sa gigantesque batterie. De quoi satisfaire pleinement les joueurs.

item.title: Test de la OnePlus Watch Lite : une montre fine, élégante et accessible qui mise tout sur la santé
item.description: Avec sa OnePlus Watch Lite, la marque chinoise propose une montre fine et plus accessible, mais toujours aussi élégante et dotée de nombreuses fonctions de santé.

item.title: "Unconstitutional": Federal judge blocks Arkansas social media safety law
item.description: A federal judge has hit pause on Arkansas's controversial social media law, ruling that Act 901 likely violates the First Amendment. Here is what you need to know.

item.title: Le plus grand smartphone du marché voit déjà son prix baisser sur Amazon
item.description: Le TCL NXTPAPER 60 Ultra est un smartphone qui se distingue par son immense écran au confort visuel unique. Original, il devient surtout plus attractif avec une réduction de 90 euros, passant de 499 à 409 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Ces 5 fabricants de TV sont accusés d’enregistrer en secret ce que vous regardez
item.description: Des constructeurs de télévisions parmi les plus importants au monde sont poursuivis en justice pour espionnage non consenti des utilisateurs.

item.title: The Surprising Way Hurricanes Pump Carbon Into the Air—and Life Into the Ocean
item.description: New research shows that tropical cyclones leave behind more than death and destruction.

item.title: You can play Fallout 76 completely for free this week — here's how
item.description: Here's how to play Fallout 76 — and all of its content — for free this week.

item.title: Gemini 3.0 Flash arrive : trois nouveaux modes de réflexion
item.description: Google vient de presser le bouton "déploiement" pour Gemini 3.0 Flash sur nos smartphones. Une mise à jour qui semble anodine, mais qui cache une refonte totale de la manière dont votre IA réfléchit avant de vous répondre.

item.title: How a VPN works (and why you should care)
item.description: The best VPNs can make your online life more private with software that's convenient and cheap — sometimes even free. While keeping your IP address invisible, you can use your VPN to explore streaming content from all over the world or (virtually) sneak into a sports event that's not available in your area.However, while VPNs are widely available, there's a strange dearth of information on what they actually do behind the scenes. You may know that a VPN masks your device with a proxy server to make it look like you're somewhere else, and maybe even that encryption is involved. But finding any ...

item.title: Il est maintenant possible de créer des mini-applications alimentées par IA directement dans Gemini
item.description: Il y a quelques mois, Google a annoncé la sortie d’Opal, un outil destiné à coder simplement. Grâce à lui, il est possible de créer des mini-applications sans programmation. Cet outil est désormais accessible via Gemini sur le web.

item.title: Samsung will show off its expanded Micro RGB TV series at CES
item.description: Last year at CES, Samsung debuted its first mainstream Micro RGB TV, a 115-inch model that surprised us with its rich, vivid colors and $30,000 price tag. Now, the company has announced that it will be showing off an entire lineup of Micro RGB TVs at CES 2026 ranging from 55- to 115-inch models, promising to set "a new standard for premium home viewing." As a reminder, Micro RGB is a unique new technology similar to Mini LED displays. Unlike the white backlights used on Mini LEDs, though, it uses tiny red, green and blue LEDs that produce more accurate colors and offer smaller and more contro...

item.title: Pot stocks pop on Schedule 3 hopes: Tilray Brands, Trulieve Cannabis, Cresco Labs: How high will they go?
item.description: President Trump has hinted that he might lessen restrictions through an executive order, although no official announcement has yet been made. Shares of publicly traded companies operating in the cannabis space continue to perform strongly as the Trump administration considers reclassifying marijuana.

item.title: Rad Power Bikes files for bankruptcy protection
item.description: Rad Power Bikes, the once dominant electric bicycle brand in the US, filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection this week as it seeks to sell of its company. The move comes less than a month after Rad Power said it could not afford to recall its older e-bike batteries that had been designated a fire […]

item.title: Federal judge signals he may side with Trump on White House ballroom project. Here’s why
item.description: U.S. District Judge Richard Leon said it’s possible he will make a final decision on the temporary block by Wednesday. A federal judge said Tuesday he’s leaning toward denying a preservationist group’s request to temporarily halt President Donald Trump’s White House ballroom project, saying the organization failed to show that “irreparable harm” would be caused if the project moves forward.U.S. District Judge Richard Leon said he could issue a final decision on the restraining order by Wednesday. But Leon said he plans to hold another hearing in January on the National Trust for Historic Prese...

item.title: The Samsung P9 microSD Express card for Switch 2 drops to a record-low price
item.description: The Nintendo Switch 2 was the console launch of the year, and if you got your hands on one at launch, you may now be thinking about expanding its storage. There weren't a ton of microSD Express cards on the market with the Switch 2 first came out, and while they are still not ubiquitous today, you have more options than you did earlier this year. One of the latest to come out is Samsung's P9 Express card, and it's on sale right now. Currently, you can pick up the 256GB Samsung P9 Express microSD Express Card for $33, down from $55. The 40 percent discount brings the microSD down to a new all-t...

item.title: Nvidia s’apprêterait à réduire drastiquement la production de ses cartes graphiques
item.description: Nvidia aurait décidé de freiner la production de ses cartes graphiques à destination du grand public au premier trimestre 2026 pour faire face à la crise de la RAM actuelle.

item.title: Skana Robotics helps fleets of underwater robots communicate with each other
item.description: Skana Robotics built a decision-making algorithm that helps unmanned vessels react and adapt to data from other vessels.

item.title: Fortinet products hit by further security flaws - giving hackers access to systems and more
item.description: Two new Fortinet flaws are being actively abused in the wild in reconnaissance attacks.

item.title: The best games to play on Xbox Game Pass in 2025
item.description: From pervasive layoffs to continued price hikes, things didn't go so well for Xbox in 2025. But even though Game Pass, the Xbox subscription service, isn't quite the deal it once was, there are still a lot of excellent titles to check out. This was an especially good year for indie titles, with breakout hits […]

item.title: The best shows streaming on Apple TV in 2025
item.description: Apple's streaming service got a new name this year - it dropped the "plus" and is now just Apple TV - but its actual programming didn't change all that much. And that's good news for sci-fi fans, as the service continued to cement itself as the preeminent destination for the genre in the streaming era. […]

item.title: ‘The Muppet Show’ Returns for One Night Only Next February
item.description: It's time to play the music; it's time to light the lights.

item.title: The 10 best shows to stream on Disney Plus and Hulu from 2025
item.description: Disney Plus and Hulu had an eventful year. Not only did the streaming services release a swath of exciting original shows and new seasons, but they're also in the midst of a transformation that will further integrate Hulu with Disney Plus. The "unified" app experience will have a revamped interface that's supposed to make it […]

item.title: What could’ve been Google’s worst year turned into one of its best
item.description: 2025 could have been a pretty disastrous year for Google. The company came in knowing it had three major legal battles to fight, increasing competition in the burgeoning AI market, and a new US president to adapt to. It looked possible - perhaps likely - that the company might be broken up and forced to […]

item.title: The Verge’s 2025 in review
item.description: The year 2025 has been, to put it mildly, eventful. If you’re like me, you’ve felt as if it’s pretty much impossible to keep up with things; every day brings something new, much of it baffling or enraging. But that’s not the case for everything — and so, as with past years, we’re using this […]

item.title: What is the release date for Pluribus episode 8 on Apple TV?
item.description: Pluribus' eighth episode is set to be released later this week – here's when we expect it'll arrive.

item.title: Big Tech bent the knee for Trump in 2025
item.description: Sure, we've seen millions poured into lobbying and other means of influence during every presidency, but the last two years set a whole new bar. Business leaders, including those from almost every Big Tech company, stepped over themselves to prove fealty to Donald Trump's second administration. It's easy to see why: Their kowtowing was meant to secure regulatory favors, gain tax and tariff advantages and avoid Trump's ire. Ultimately, it was all in the service of appeasing their shareholders. Why else would Apple CEO Tim Cook, someone who typically cultivates a progressive image, hand deliver ...

item.title: Mistral launches OCR 3 to digitize enterprise documents, touts 74% win rate and $2-per-1,000-page pricing
item.description: Mistral AI, the French artificial intelligence company valued at €11.7 billion, unveiled its third-generation optical character recognition model on Tuesday, positioning document digitization as the critical first step enterprises must take before realizing the full potential of generative AI.The new model, called Mistral OCR 3, claims a 74% win rate against competing products when processing forms, scanned documents, complex tables, and handwritten content. Mistral priced the technology aggressively at $2 per 1,000 pages — with a 50% discount for batch processing — dramatically undercutting m...

item.title: With Apple’s help, storytellers are figuring out Vision Pro
item.description: The headset opens up immersive new opportunities for dramas, documentaries, music videos, and beyond. Some filmmakers and developers are diving right in. More than any other Apple product, the Vision Pro is still—to quote Bob Dylan by way of Steve Jobs—busy being born. Announced at the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) on June 5, 2023 and shipped the following February, the $3,500 spatial computing headset has evolved some since its first release. This year brought a meaty operating system upgrade and a slightly revised version of the device sporting Apple’s powerful new M5 chip....

item.title: Ben & Jerry’s free bar drop: List of stores, new flavors, and where to find sweet treats nationwide today
item.description: With a new lineup on tap for January 2026, the ice cream brand is letting fans try the offerings for free at 150 ‘scoop shop’ locations. Ice cream lovers rejoice: Ben & Jerry’s has something new and exciting to introduce to the world.

item.title: Your Ray-Ban Meta glasses just got a major audio update — especially for Spotify users
item.description: Latest Ray-Ban Meta update brings Conversation Focus and Spotify soundtracking to you smart specs.

item.title: Lenovo retire 250 € à ce puissant laptop avec écran OLED 120 Hz et Ryzen AI 7 juste avant Noël
item.description: Si vous cherchez un laptop performant pour bien commencer l'année, ce modèle de chez Lenovo pourrait bien vous plaire : avec son sublime écran OLED et sa puce Ryzen AI 7, le voilà en promotion à 849 euros contre 1 099 euros de base.

item.title: Brendan Carr, FCC chief, is headed to the Senate for questioning over the Jimmy Kimmel controversy
item.description: It’s the first time he faces the Senate since he pressured broadcasters to remove Jimmy Kimmel off the air. Federal Communications Commission Chairman Brendan Carr will face Senate questioning Wednesday for the first time since he pressured broadcasters to take ABC late-night host Jimmy Kimmel off the air, a stance that drew bipartisan criticism and raised concerns about government interference in the media.Carr will appear before the Senate Commerce committee for an oversight hearing that will also include the FCC’s two other commissioners, Olivia Trusty and Anna M. Gomez. It will be the fir...

item.title: Pourquoi l’étiquette obligatoire des voitures va radicalement changer dans les prochains mois
item.description: Dans son « paquet automobile », revenant notamment sur l'interdiction de vente de voitures thermiques en 2035, la Commission européenne a introduit une nouvelle règle sur l'étiquette énergie des voitures électriques et thermiques neuves. Au programme, un affichage enrichi et standardisé.

item.title: Windows 11 : Microsoft dévoile les nouveautés à venir dans la mise à jour 26H1, voici tout ce qu’il faut retenir
item.description: Microsoft a publié il y a quelques jours une nouvelle build de Windows 11 auprès des membres de son programme Insider. Au programme, de nombreuses nouveautés qui arriveront sans doute avec la mise à jour 26H1.

item.title: Piratage au ministère de l’Intérieur : comment des hackers ont accédé aux fiches S
item.description: On savait la sécurité de l'État parfois perfectible, mais là, on franchit un cap. Le groupe ShinyHunters revendique l'accès aux bases de données les plus sensibles de Beauvau. Entre le logiciel CHEOPS et les identifiants partagés en clair, le ministère vient de s'offrir une leçon de cybersécurité dont il se serait bien passé.

item.title: 15 Best Food Gifts, as Tested by Our Tastebuds (2025)
item.description: From tinned fish to baked goodies, you can deliver the best-tasting treats to their door—even if you don’t live close by.

item.title: « En s’accrochant désespérément au moteur thermique », l’Europe est-elle en train de donner les clés de notre industrie automobile à la Chine ?
item.description: Sous la pression de l'Allemagne, la Commission européenne propose officiellement de revenir sur le dogme du "tout électrique", offrant un sursis inespéré aux moteurs thermiques via une usine à gaz réglementaire. Un revirement politique vendu comme du pragmatisme, mais qui ressemble furieusement à un sabordage industriel face à la Chine.
